page.title: 12A farm near Mexborough
page.content: When we visited a farm near our school we learnt about the different crops grown there.The farmer there grew 4 different types of crops : winter barley,winter wheat,oil seed rape and potatoes.There were 14 fields at tye farm.The biggest field was measured to be 240,000 metres square. The smallest field is measured at 20,000 metre square. All the fields had a name: Ludwell, Dog Kennels,Quarry Fields,Shop Fields,Wet Acres,Garden Field,Riverside,Paddock Field,Driveside,Below Yard,Odd Shaped Field,23 Acre Field,3 Cornered Field and Mill Field. The farmer uses crop rotation:potatoes,winter wheat,winter barley,oil seed rape,winter wheat and potatoes.
